description: CONVERSION INTO 2 X 2 BEDROOM SELF CONTAINED FLATS.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of 5 years, beginning with the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - Before the building/extension hereby permitted is first occupied, the windows in the alterations to elevation of the shall be glazed with obscured glass and shall be maintained as such thereafter.

Condition : 3 - Before the building is first used the measures for access for disabled persons shown on drawing no shall be implemented to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority and shall be permanently maintained thereafter.

Condition : 4 - The existing garage located in the rear garden and hard surface in front of the dwellings shall remain and be adequately maintained for the sole use of the occupiers of the flats.  Reason for condition:To obviate the undesirable practice of kerbside parking in surrounding streets.
